price: (Ragaan) shaneessituun abaarsi Rabbii isa irra haa jiraatu yoo inni namoota sobaan (maqaa ishee xureessan) irraa ta’e, ( jechuun kakachuudha).
arabic: وَٱلۡخَٰمِسَةُ أَنَّ لَعۡنَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wal-khāmisatu anna laʿnata al-lahi ʿalayhi in kāna mina al-kādhibīna
